# Time Warp IDE v5.0.1

Released: 2025-12-02

## Platform Builds


## Installation

### Windows 2000 Edition
1. Download `TimeWarpIDE-win2000.zip`
2. Extract to any folder
3. Run `TimeWarpIDE.exe`

### Python Version
```bash
pip install time-warp-ide
time-warp
```

## Checksums

Verify downloads:
```bash
sha256sum -c checksums.txt
```
